settings.title: Pool 55'' - PCMAG
settings.text: There isn’t much variation in outdoor TV designs. Every model we’ve tested has had a similar blocky shape, as that’s necessary for weatherproofing. The Sylvox features a matte black metal chassis with a slightly textured finish. Its bezels measure 0.6 inches on the sides and top.

settings.title: Deck Pro Qled 55'' - Nerdtechy
settings.text: Modern, minimal design with a thin bezel. Wide viewing angle and high brightness. Easy-to-use WebOS operating system. Superior dust and water resistance. Extremely durable, all-metal construction.

settings.title: Deck Pro - The-gadgeteer
settings.text: Even in the dead of winter, Houston has plenty of beautiful days to enjoy our (relatively) new back patio. The sun shines brightly, inviting us to relax outdoors. Each clear day reminds us how our outdoor space can bring comfort all year round.

settings.title: Deck Pro Qled 43"- The-gadgeteer
settings.text: Even in the dead of winter, Houston still has plenty of beautiful days to enjoy our (relatively) new patio. We still need to add a fire table, but our top priority was an outdoor TV. So when Sylvox offered a 43-inch model for review, I jumped at the chance.

settings.title: Deck Pro 55'' - Make Use Of
settings.text: The Sylvox 55-inch Deck Pro Series 4K HDR Outdoor TV provides a durable, weather-resistant solution for outdoor entertainment in backyards and commercial venues.

settings.title: Deck pro qled 43"-hightechdad
settings.text: Being able to watch sports or a movie outside with friends and family has always been a big thing for me.

settings.title: Pool Pro 55"-slashgear
settings.text: Sylvox has a whole range of TVs designed to live outside, and I'm not talking about 72 degrees-year-round-and-maybe-it-drizzles-every-now-and-then year-round.

settings.title: Deck pro qled_ geekspin
settings.text: The Sylvox Deck Pro QLED is an affordable outdoor TV built for all kinds of weather. It offers great picture quality alongside a sleek yet rugged design.

settings.title: Deck Pro 43'' - Monitornerds
settings.text: The Sylvox Outdoor TV is like a regular TV, but it’s designed to withstand harsher environments than a typical indoor TV.
